ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Fixed "Module exception data" issue #127 - Fixed missing Y axis in statistics graph (issue #123) - ZWaveLib rework - phase 1 completed (also solve issue #118) - Fixed bug in Statistics class when parsing address of remote modules - Fixed MIG UPnP interface MediaMediaInfo/MediaPositionInfo double quotes escaping issue - Fixed MIG CameraInput interface not reading configuration
